titleStmt.title: An extract out of the historie of the last French King Henry the fourth of famous memorie according to an autentique [sic] copie written in his life time. To which is added his being murdered with a knife in his coach in Paris the 14. of May last 1610. styl. Rom. With an apprecation [sic] for the safeguard and happines of our most gracious soueraigne Iames the first, &c. Seene and allowed by authoritie.
titleStmt.author: Skory, Edmond.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Barker, printer to the Kings most excellent Maiestie. Anno 1610. To be sold at Britaine Burse,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf is blank except for signature-mark "A" in a mortised ornament.
Running title reads: The life and death of the French King.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
